greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: Number of set partitions of {1,2,..,n} such that |k| is a block and no block |m| with m < k exists, (1 <= n, 1 <= k <= n).
comment: Mirror image of A106436. - _Alois P. Heinz_, Jan 29 2019
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..141, flattened
formula: Recursion: The value of T(n,k) is, if n < 0 or k < 0 or k > n undefined, else if n = 1 then 1 else if k = n then T(n-1,1) - T(n-1,n-1); in all other cases T(n,k) = T(n,k+1) + T(n-1,k).
maple: T := proc(n, k) option remember; if n = 1 then 1 elif n = k then T(n-1,1) - T(n-1,n-1) else T(n-1,k) + T(n, k+1) fi end:
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Apr 08 2011
